verses.kjv: My breath is corrupt, my days are extinct, the graves are ready for me.
verses.ct: My spirit is broken, my life is fading, and the grave is waiting for me.

verses.kjv: Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?
verses.ct: I am surrounded by people who mock me, and I can't look away from their insults.

verses.kjv: Lay down now, put me in a surety with thee; who is he that will strike hands with me?
verses.ct: God, please guarantee my case yourself — who else would be willing to stand up for me?

verses.kjv: For thou hast hid their heart from understanding: therefore shalt thou not exalt them.
verses.ct: You have closed their minds to understanding, so you will not let them triumph.

verses.kjv: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.
verses.ct: A person who betrays his friends for personal gain — his own children will suffer for it.

verses.kjv: He hath made me also a byword of the people; and aforetime I was as a tabret.
verses.ct: God has turned me into a joke among the people; they spit in my face.

verses.kjv: Mine eye also is dim by reason of sorrow, and all my members are as a shadow.
verses.ct: My eyes have grown weak from grief, and my whole body has wasted away to a shadow.

verses.kjv: Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.
verses.ct: Honest people will be shocked by this, and the innocent will be outraged at the godless.

verses.kjv: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.
verses.ct: The righteous will stay on their path, and those with clean hands will grow even stronger.

verses.kjv: But as for you all, do ye return, and come now: for I cannot find one wise man among you.
verses.ct: But all of you — go ahead, try again, because I haven't found a single wise person among you.

verses.kjv: My days are past, my purposes are broken off, even the thoughts of my heart.
verses.ct: My days are over, my plans are shattered — every dream my heart held is gone.

verses.kjv: They change the night into day: the light is short because of darkness.
verses.ct: These people turn night into day; they claim light is near when darkness surrounds me.

verses.kjv: If I wait, the grave is mine house: I have made my bed in the darkness.
verses.ct: If all I can look forward to is the grave as my home, if I spread my bed in darkness,

verses.kjv: I have said to corruption, Thou art my father: to the worm, Thou art my mother, and my sister.
verses.ct: if I call out to decay, 'You are my father,' and to the maggot, 'You are my mother and sister,'

verses.kjv: And where is now my hope? as for my hope, who shall see it?
verses.ct: then where is my hope? Who can see any hope for me?

verses.kjv: They shall go down to the bars of the pit, when our rest together is in the dust.
verses.ct: Will it go down with me to the gates of death, when we descend together into the dust?
